text:
[Verse]
In a sea of faces I roam
Searching for a heartbeat
For home
City lights flashing
They gleam
Chasing shadows
Diving in a dream

[Verse 2]
Echoes of laughter they fade
In this urban jungle
Masquerade
We are whispers in the night
Lost in the neon light

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd
Can't turn it down
Music so loud
Head in the clouds

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on sidewalks they blend
Every stranger a friend
Colors of life so bright
Dancing under streetlight

[Chorus]
Lost in the crowd
Can't turn it down
Music so loud
Head in the clouds

[Bridge]
Close my eyes and just breathe
Finding moments to believe
In this maze I won't stop
Reaching for the mountaintop
title: Lost in the Crowd
